Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb

Contains classes and interfaces that form the base implementation of XMLDB database support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeCommonElements Constants that define some common/shared column names.
IAeXMLDBConnection A connection to an XML database.
IAeXMLDBDataSource An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the XMLDB database.
IAeXMLDBNull Interface that is implemented by the XMLDB NULL objects.
IAeXMLDBResponseHandler This interface defines a way in which XMLDB query results are handled and returned as a List.
IAeXMLDBStorage Interface for a XMLDB storage object.
IAeXMLDBStorageImpl Instances of this interface must implement the parts of the XMLDB storage framework that are implementation specific.
IAeXMLDBXQueryResponse Represents an XQuery response from an XML database.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractXMLDBStorage A base class for all XMLDB storage objects.
AeAbstractXMLDBStorageConnection A base class for a XMLDB storage connection.
AeAbstractXMLDBStorageConnectionProvider A base class for a XMLDB storage connection delegate.
AeAbstractXMLDBStorageProvider Base class for all XMLDB storage providers.
AeDebugXMLDBStorageConnection A version of the XMLDB DB connection that will throw an exception on 'close' if neither commit nor rollback have been called.
AeMonitoredXMLDBDataSource Reports how long it took to acquire a connection
AeXMLDBConfig This class encapsulates the XMLDB XQuery statements used by the Active BPEL XMLDB based persistence layer.
AeXMLDBDataSource The XMLDB data source.
AeXMLDBDebugConnection Debug connection - used in development to find connections that aren't being closed properly.
AeXMLDBDefaultNSVisitor This class is used to visit a Fast Document and forcibly qualify (with a prefix) all elements that are in a default namespace.
AeXMLDBDelegatingConnection Base class for delegating connections.
AeXMLDBObject A base object for all classes that need to look up XMLDB statements from the xmldb config object.
AeXMLDBQueryBuilder A XMLDB query builder creates a XMLDB query (typically an XQuery) from a filter.
AeXMLDBStorageConnection A XMLDB version of the DB Connection wrapper interface.
AeXMLDBStorageProviderFactory A storage factory that creates XMLDB versions of the store objects.
AeXMLDBUtil A class with some static methods to do some standard XMLDB related operations.
AeXMLDBValidator This class validates the state of the XMLDB database.
 

Exception Summary
AeUniqueConstraintViolationXMLDBException A special exception that will get thrown when there is a XMLDB unique constraint violation.
AeXMLDBException An exception that is thrown when an error occurs in the XMLDB layer.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb Description

Contains classes and interfaces that form the base implementation of XMLDB database support. This includes base classes for storage objects, the XMLDB data source, response handlers, connection classes, etc...
